column5: Our home is the perfect location for anyone coming in to town for an Aggie football game, graduation, parent's weekend, or just simply a weekend get-away! We are located on a quiet street less than 5 miles to Kyle Field and close to EVERYTHING! Comfortably we can sleep 6. We have cable, Netflix, and Wi-fi for your convenience. We are staying near you in town and will be available immediately if needed during your stay.
column8: Spacious home in a GREAT location
